title: Dead
message: Some injuries are too much even for a Champion of Chaos to endure...

title: Mortal Injury
message: Unless your next Combat Roll is a double, you succumb to your injuries and die.

title: Severed Leg
message: An unfortunate encounter with a hungry squig leaves you bereft of a leg. Subtract 1 from all future Combat Rolls. If you suffer this injury a second time, you are dead.

title: Severed Arm
message: A Fyreslayer's axe disarms you in more ways than one! Subtract 1 from all future Combat Rolls that are a double except for a double-6. If you suffer this injury a second time, you are dead.

title: Serious Concussion
message: A thunderous blow from a Retributor's hammer leaves you somewhat discombobulated. Subtract 1 from your next Combat Roll while you recover.

title: Fearsome Scars
message: Though horribly scarred by the claws of a dread beast you actually look kinda badass! Add 1 to your next Combat Roll while your scars are still raw and imposing.
